name: omnioom-whatsapp
description: This is a simple and powerful WhatsApp bot built using the [Baileys](https://github.com/WhiskeySockets/Baileys) library, an unofficial WhatsApp Web API for Node.js. It allows you to automate replies, handle user messages, and create intelligent bot logic. This project was forked from Nexos Creator's [whatsapp-bot-baileys](https://github.com/nexoscreator/whatsapp-bot-baileys) project. The guy contributed so much to the community, so be sure to visit and leave a like!
author: Iman Sjamhudi <indoomni@gmail.com>
